title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

title: [PR] Feature/image error diagnose
summary:
## Summary

This PR introduces **image-based error diagnosis** to Cortex via a new `diagnose` command.

Users can now diagnose system or installation errors directly from **screenshots or clipboard images**, solving a common problem where errors cannot be copy-pasted from terminals or GUI dialog

Fixes the `@lydell/node-pty` TypeScript errors that occur in git worktrees by symlinking `node_modules` from the main project to worktrees at creation time.
